hero.title: Welcome to Gramin: Savor the Purity of Vegetarian Delights
hero.subtitle: At Gramin, we invite you to experience a culinary journey where fresh, wholesome ingredients meet passionate craftsmanship, creating unforgettable flavors.

about.title: The Gramin Experience
about.paragraph1: From the moment you step into Gramin, you're not just dining; you're embarking on a journey of taste and tradition. We're dedicated to crafting exquisite vegetarian dishes using the freshest, high-quality ingredients, ensuring every bite is a testament to purity and passion.
about.paragraph2: At Gramin, our commitment extends beyond the plate. We strive to create a warm, welcoming atmosphere where friends and family can gather, share, and celebrate the richness of plant-based cuisine. Come discover why Gramin is the perfect destination for your next pure vegetarian culinary adventure.
